Info.Title: We Still Kill the Old Way
Info.Writer: Sacha Bennett, Dougie Brimson, Gary Lawrence, Colin Lomax, Rod Smith
Info.Actors: Ian Ogilvy, Alison Doody, Christopher Ellison, Danny Hatchard
Info.Plot: When retired East End villain Charlie Archer is murdered by a feral street gang, his brother Ritchie returns to London from Spain to investigate.
